name: Sword Of Meaning
description:
Travel deep inside your mind and slay the demons that disturb your peace. You won't do it alone, your companion Marisa will help you have the courage to go and face what is inside.

She will guide and help you figure out what your demons are by creating a multi-purpose sword built from your panel of hope: the things that make you enjoy life.

With the sword, you will defend yourself against enemies, deflect their attacks, throw it and even ride it like a hoverboard.

Go on this adventure and discover what is hidden in the darkest corners of your mind and experience the joy of freeing your consciousness while having tons of fun.
